titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. 1107), entitled "For the relief of Adrian Rodriguez", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/30/2011--Introduced. Refers a private relief bill (H.R. 1107) to the chief judge of the U.S. Court of Federal Claims with instructions to report back to the House of Representatives.
